name: faddiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of liking or disliking particular things, especially food, for no good reason: He's grown out of his teenage faddiness. She mocks the faddishness of fashion. See
faddy
More examplesFewer examplesForget faddiness - there’s only the one cereal on offer. Parents sometimes nurture faddiness by being too anxious. Long before dietary faddiness became confusing, a pinch of salt was a nutritional godsend.We list some common causes of faddishness and guidelines to encourage good eating habits.
